option.description: ECH, External Clock, High Power Mode (4-32 MHz): device clock supplied to CLKIN pin

option.name: ECM

option.description: ECL, External Clock, Low Power Mode (0-0.5 MHz): device clock supplied to CLKIN pin
option.name: ECL

option.description: INTOSC oscillator: I/O function on CLKIN pin
option.name: INTOSC

option.description: EXTRC oscillator: External RC circuit connected to CLKIN pin
option.name: EXTRC

option.description: HS Oscillator, High-speed crystal/resonator connected between OSC1 and OSC2 pins
option.name: HS

option.name: XT

option.description: LP Oscillator, Low-power crystal connected between OSC1 and OSC2 pins
option.name: LP

option.description: Write protection off
option.name: OFF

option.description: 000h to 1FFh write protected, 200h to 7FFh may be modified by EECON control

option.description: 000h to 7FFh write protected, no addresses may be modified by EECON control

setting.name: SMP
setting.description: SPI Data Input Sample Phase bit

setting.description: Synchronous Serial Port Mode Select bits

setting.name: CKP
setting.description: SPI Clock Polarity Select bit/I2C Clock stretch

setting.name: RSEN
setting.description: : Repeated Start Condition Enable bit (Master mode only)

setting.name: PEN
setting.description: Stop Condition Enable bit (Master mode only)

setting.name: ACKEN
setting.description: Acknowledge Sequence Enable bit (Master Receive mode only)

setting.name: GCEN
setting.description: General Call Enable bit (Slave mode only)

setting.name: AHEN
setting.description: Address Hold Enable bit (I2C Slave mode only)

setting.name: SBCDE
setting.description: Slave mode Bus Collision Detect Enable bit (I2C Slave mode only)

setting.name: SDAHT
setting.description: SDA Hold Time selection bit (I2C mode only)

setting.name: ACKTIM
setting.description: Acknowledge Time Status bit (I2C Slave mode only)
